title: Queen of the Pigeons
subtitle: Digital Piece
alt: woman with long brown hair in a low bun with two pieces free at the front. She has a ghostly crown with ghostly pigeons flying around her
description:
2021 

I played around with the 'add' layer effect in this project, I really like how it stands out from the rest of the piece. It was also an experiment with adding things on top of a portrait to add interest.
